page.title: 18SCOUTS,BROWNIES AND GUIDES
page.content: Scouts We have 2 cub scout packs in Sonning Common and one scout troop. It is very interesting and there is a do such ascycling wide games hikes and camping. You can earn lots of badges. We also have to go on parade. We are part of South Chiltern District. The scouts meet on Tuesdays at headquarters Guides and Brownies There are 2 Guide companies and 3 Brownie packs All of these meet at HQ in Baskerville Rd. Guides do things like go camping every summer, ice skating, and do lots of badges like first aid, hostess, entertainer and service.
